title: serenity
description: My interpretation of a BMS (Be-Music Source) game client & web service.
details:
serenity is a personal reimagining of the BMS game client. It merges form and function through a sharp monochrome aesthetic, tight input response, and a long-term vision of evolving into its own standalone game and community.

Features:

  • Website: built myself
  • Client: Fork of LR2oraja ~endless dream~
  • Web Service: Fork of zk's Tachi
  • Online score tracking and leaderboards
  • Never-seen-before progressive overload mechanics
  • Daily missions and progressive skill challenges
  • Monochromatic aesthetic
  • Optimized input handling with reduced latency
  • Focused feedback systems that prioritize player performance

Everything about Serenity is deliberate — from the fonts to the way feedback pulses on screen — designed not for flash, but for focus. The project represents a philosophy that game interfaces should enhance the core experience rather than compete with it.

Technologies: Java, OpenGL, LR2oraja (fork), JavaScript, Node.js
